summary:
**Substantial Holder Notice (Form 603) Summary:**  

- **Substantial Holder:** Ballard and Mt Ida AU Pty Ltd (ACN 664 555 873)  
- **Date of Becoming Substantial Holder:** 9 July 2025  
- **Voting Power:** 8.66% (29,453,592 fully paid ordinary shares in Ballard Mining Limited)  
- **Nature of Interest:** Deemed relevant interest due to escrow restrictions under Prospectus dated 30 May 2025.  
- **Registered Holders:**  
  - Hancock Prospecting Pty Ltd (7,281,548 shares)  
  - Idemitsu Mt Ida Pty Ltd (7,604,058 shares)  
  - Lithium Resources Operations Pty Ltd (14,567,986 shares)  

**No material trading or capital markets impact identified** (disclosure of existing escrowed holdings).
